meanings.sent1: The variole on his arm was a sign of the illness.
meanings.sent2: She had a variole on her face from the disease.
meanings.sent3: The variole seemed to have a personality of its own.
meanings.sent4: The variole was a tiny volcano erupting on his skin.
meanings.sent5: The doctor pointed out the variole to the concerned patient.

meanings.definition: A small, round, colored spot or mark.
meanings.sent1: Her painting had a variole of red in the corner.
meanings.sent2: The variole on the butterfly's wing added beauty to it.
meanings.sent3: The variole on the apple made it look like a tiny planet.
meanings.sent4: The variole of light on the wall was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: He noticed a variole of dust on the old bookshelf.
